name: Twitch Frog Frenzy
description:
Jump from platform to platform in order to collect flies to attract more twitch frogs to Ludwig's stream and make him a 100 viewer Andy! Beware of the water though - falling in will sweep you back to camp and you'll lose any flies you caught!

This game was made as a part of the Ludwig Jam in 2021.

Sadly due to the time restrictions only keyboard is supported.

  • Space - jump, hold to increase jump distance
  • A/D - turn
  • Shift - hold with A/D in order to turn faster
  • ESC - pause the game
